about.details:
Incorporated in 2019, Net Pix Shorts Digital Media Limited is a Mumbai-based technology entertainment company. The company prepares online short film content and publish it on the digital media channels and OTT platforms.

It started content distribution through its channel "Net Pix Shorts" on the 'YouTube' portal. As of Sept 05, 2020, it has released 12 videos constituting 154.94 minutes of content and also has 8 short films. The company has 246,000 subscribers to its YouTube channel.

Net Pix Shorts Digital Media also uploads its videos on other digital platforms like Hungama Play, Sony Liv, Mx Player, Shorts TV, and Hotstar. Recently, it has released its own music channel, "Net Pix Raw Music". In this, the company has uploaded 4 music videos aggregating to 15.70 minutes of content.

Competitive strengths

  1. Diverse content library.
  2. Global presence.
  3. Qualified management.

faqs.question: What is the Net Pix Shorts IPO?
faqs.answer:
Net Pix Shorts IPO is a SME IPO of 900000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2.70 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹30 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on November 18, 2020, and closes on November 23, 2020.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Net Pix Shorts IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Net Pix Shorts IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Net Pix Shorts IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Net Pix Shorts IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Net Pix Shorts IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Net Pix Shorts IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Net Pix Shorts IPO opens on November 18, 2020 and closes on November 23, 2020.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Net Pix Shorts IPO?
faqs.answer: Net Pix Shorts IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Net Pix Shorts IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Net Pix Shorts IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Net Pix Shorts IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Net Pix Shorts IPO will be done on Thursday, November 26, 2020, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, December 1, 2020. Check the Net Pix Shorts IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Net Pix Shorts IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Net Pix Shorts IPO listing date is on Wednesday, December 2, 2020.
